CustomField.formula:
Case__r.Case_Number__c &" - "&
"Hi, This is from CA DIR. Your " & Meeting__r.Record_Type_Name__c &" is "&text(Meeting__r.Status__c) &" for "&TEXT(MONTH(Meeting__r.Meeting_Start_Date__c)) & "/" & TEXT(DAY(Meeting__r.Meeting_Start_Date__c)) & "/" &TEXT(YEAR(Meeting__r.Meeting_Start_Date__c))&" "&Meeting__r.Meeting_Start_Time__c &
", which is "&IF(ISPICKVAL(Meeting__r.In_Person_Remote_Meeting__c,"In Person" ),"an ","a ")&text(Meeting__r.In_Person_Remote_Meeting__c )&" meeting - "&
IF(ISPICKVAL(Meeting__r.In_Person_Remote_Meeting__c,"In Person" ),"at " &Meeting__r.WCA_Office__r.Name &", "& Meeting__r.WCA_Office__r.Office_Address_Formula__c ,IF(ISPICKVAL(Meeting__r.In_Person_Remote_Meeting__c,"Phone/Remote")," "& Meeting__r.Audio_telephone__c,IF(ISPICKVAL(Meeting__r.In_Person_Remote_Meeting__c,"Video" ),"Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: "& Meeting__r.Video_Meeting_URL__c & " " & Meeting__r.Video_Meeting_Information__c,""))) &
" - If you wish to continue receiving messages from the DIR/CA Labor Commissionerâ€™s Office, type YES. Msg & Data Rates May Apply."
CustomField.label: SMS Text
